title: Lynda - AngularJS: Form Validation
description:
Lynda - AngularJS: Form Validation

This Course will be good to the Best for DL within 30 days after has been post, after that it might not be good DL already, please do me favour to continue seeding to keep this torrent alive.

41m 52s Intermediate Nov 10, 2015 | Uploaded in Nov 27, 2015 by 2boweb
Subject: Web 
Software: AngularJS 
Author: Ray Villalobos 

Validation is key to successful online forms. Implementing dynamic form validation that reacts to input can be difficult to implement with languages like JavaScript and jQuery. However, AngularJS allows you to take advantage of two-way data-binding functionality without having to write any JavaScript code. This makes reacting to input from the userâ€”as it happensâ€”a breeze.â€¨â€¨In this short course, Ray Villalobos shows how to implement form validation on any HTML form using the built-in validation properties and methods in AngularJS. Together, you'll look at how AngularJS can help style forms dynamically as the user updates the content. Plus, explore how to implement validation with JavaScript, just in case you need more fine-tuned control of form interactions.
